game.name: Nuclear Fighter
game.shortDescription: Is a fun and fast 2D platformer with a side view. Your goal is to escape from the city and survive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a fun and fast 2D platformer with a side view. Your goal is to escape from the city and survive.
